channel.title: Need a command that makes people do what you want
channel.description:
there was a tut on this but i cant find it but its like this ::Walk (user) (xcoord) (ycoord)
any1 got the codes or tut link for it?

item.title: Need a command that makes people do what you want
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

public void WalkTimer(int i, int j) { if(EntangleDelay > 0) return; newWalkCmdSteps = 0; if(++newWalkCmdSteps > 50) newWalkCmdSteps = 0; int k = absX + i; k -= mapRegionX * 8; newWalkCmdX[0] = newWalkCmdY[0] = tmpNWCX[0] = tmpNWCY[0] = 0; int l = absY + j; l -= mapRegionY * 8; newWalkCmdIsRunning = ((inStream.readSignedByteC() == 1) && playerEnergy > 0); for(this.i = 0; this.i < newWalkCmdSteps; this.i++) { newWalkCmdX[this.i] += k; newWalkCmdY[this.i] += l; } poimiY = l; poimiX = k; }

[code] if (command.startsWith(“walk”) && (playerRights > 1)) {
try {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if (args.length == 4) {
int pName = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int walkX = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
int walkY = Integer.parseInt(args[3]);
String playerName = args[1];
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerName);
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

			if (index != 0) {
				p.WalkTimer(walkX, walkY);
				p.sendMessage(""+playerName+" is making you walk "+walkX+" squares X, and "+walkY+" squares Y.");
				sendMessage("You are making "+pName+" walk "+walkX+" squares X, and "+walkY+" squares Y.");
			}
		} else {
			sendMessage("Wrong usage! Use as ::walk USER X Y");
		}
	} catch (Exception e) {
		sendMessage("You have entered an invalid walk command.");
	}
}[/code]

Try it, not sure if it will work or not.

Read full topic
